6.63: Reduced  Sand Storm cooldown from 40/35/30/25 to 40/30/20/10.
6.60: Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Sand King: Increases  Epicenter number of pulses from 6/8/10 to 7/9/11 and reduces cooldown from 140/120/100 to 120/100/80.
6.00: Sand King can no longer buy  Desolator.  Burrowstrike Fixed being able to cast while silenced. Fixed some other minor bugs. Fixed Entrench so that multiple Sand Kings can use it at the same time. Replaced Dust Trail with Sand Storm
6.68: Increased base armor from -2 to -1 (total armor is now 1.66).
6.69: Increased  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Epicenter number of pulses from 7/9/11 to 8/10/12.
6.04: Sand king can now buy  Desolator again. Reduced  Epicenter pulse interval from 0.5 to 0.25. Fixed Sandking being able to attack during Entrench.
6.05: Replaced Sand Storm with  Caustic Finale
6.06: Burrowstrike stun duration decreased from 2 to 1.65.  Epicenter Channeling time from 2/1.75/1.25 to a constant 2. Damage per pulse from 120 to 110. Reduced movement speed slow from 50% 40%. Reduced attack speed slow from 50 to 40.
6.52: Reduced base armor from 0 to -3 (total armor is now -0.34). Fixed a control issue when casting  Burrowstrike.  Sand Storm Fixed Sandstorm,  Rot and Storm Seeker from not being able to affect the same area at the same time. Fixed not affecting sleeping units.
6.09b: Sand Storm Reduced manacost from 60 to 60/50/40/30 Reduced channeling time from infinite to 20/40/60/80 (the invisibility and area damage already lasted 20/40/60/80 seconds, this fixes the channeling to end when the effects do). Slightly improved to fix lag.
6.50: Recoded  Burrowstrike: No longer turns hit enemies invulnerable during the air time. No longer causes hit enemy units to instantly face towards Sand King's starting point. No longer conflicts with  Earth Spike,  Impale,  Ravage and Burrowstrikes from other Sand Kings. No longer fails to stun and damage enemies when the targeted point was a cliff.  Sand Storm Increased radius from 200/250/300/350 to 300/350/400/550. Increased fade delay when exiting from 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.2 to 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.5.  Epicenter Reduced movement speed slow from 40% to 30% Reduced attack speed slow from 40 to 10.
6.35: Minor fixes to  Epicenter to reduce lag issues.
6.12: Increased  Sand Storm damage from 5/10/15/20 to 10/20/30/40.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c.
6.55: Increased base armor from -3 to -2 (total armor is now 0.66).
6.03: Increased  Epicenter pulse interval from 0.25 to 0.5.
6.79: Increased  Sand Storm damage increased from 20/40/60/80 to 25/50/75/100. Increased  Epicenter attack speed slow from 10 to 30.
6.78: Sand Storm Increased Invisibility fade delay when exiting from 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.5 to 1.5. Reduced damage interval from 1 to 0.5 and reduced damage accordingly to keep the same overall damage.
6.51: Fixed  Burrowstrike affecting Juggernaut during  Blade Fury. Fixed a bug between  Voodoo Restoration and Burrowstrike.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.17: Recoded  Sand Storm to improve lags.
6.11: Slight improvements to  Sand Storm to fix lag.
6.10: Changed  Burrowstrike hotkey from B to E.
6.70: Increased  strength gain from 2.3 to 2.6. Increased  Caustic Finale debuff duration from 0.25 to 2.
6.73: Epicenter's slow is no longer blocked by spell immunity. Increased  Caustic Finale debuff duration from 2 to 8.
6.72: Increased base armor from -1 to 0 (total armor is now 2.66)
5.78: Removed 0.3 second cast time on  Burrowstrike. Removed 0.3 second cast time on  Epicenter (still requires channeling).
5.79: Burrowstrike Increased hero stun duration from 1.5 to 2.17. Reduced non-hero stun duration from 3 to 2.17. Reduced Entrench and Unentrench manacost from 63 to 55. Increased  Epicenter damage per pulse from 70 to 125.
6.52b: Fixed various glitches caused by  Sand Storm with  Spectral Dagger and  Black Hole
5.77: Burrowstrike Fixed not going on cooldown when directly targeting a unit with it. Now uses 0.3 second cast time, like Sandking's other abilities.
6.80: Increased  Sand Storm radius from 275/325/375/525 to 525 on each level.
6.81: Fixed  Epicenter to support multiple instances at the same time (e.g. via  Refresher Orb).
6.84: Caustic Finale Now always triggers the explosion (via unit death or when the debuff expires). If triggered by expiring, it deals 30% of the damage. Multiple attacks on the same target no longer refresh the debuff. Now slows all damaged units by 20% for 3 seconds. Reduced debuff duration from 8 to 6.
5.84: Reduced  Epicenter damage per pulse from 125 to 120.
5.80: Sand King can now attack flying units.
6.20: Reduced  Burrowstrike damage from 80/160/240/340 to 100/160/220/280. Increased  Caustic Finale damage radius from 250 to 400.
